snippet: Robert Champion, a junior guard, scored 19 points, including a crucial 3-pointer in the final minute, as the Crusaders beat Southern to advance to the South Regional.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Holy Cross defeats Southern, 59-55, in first round of NCAA men's basketball tournament; other tournament results noted.
lead_paragraph: Robert Champion, a junior guard, scored 19 points, including a crucial 3-pointer in the final minute, as the Crusaders beat Southern to advance to the South Regional.

headline.print_headline: Holy Cross Earns Shot at Oregon, a Top Seed
headline.main: Holy Cross Earns Shot at Oregon, a Top Seed
